item.title: You cannot see Entity Framework after you have created it ...
item.description: Expand your edmx to see the cs file. The thing you have to bear in mind is when Visual Studio generate the Entity Framework edmx then it will take your default namespace without hesitate. So you need to rename the namespace by your own.
